More on Nokia, Microsoft Partnership from Nokia's blog penned by Stephen Elop and Steve Ballmer , Nokia wouldn't be just be another Windows Phone OEM. Nokia plans to help drive and define the future of the platform. That could include contributing expertise on hardware optimization, language support, customization of the software and helping bring Windows Phone to a larger range of price points, market segments and geographies.
